message: They have emails between him and refuge occupiers about constructing a shadow government with their beliefs as basis for law there. His JOB dictates he follows laws as written. While he did not violate a specific law he enabled others, encouraged others and offered comfort and aid to obvious law breakers thru his office as Sheriff. Upon determining the extent of his participation thru this investigation will determine if charges apply. Either way, the ethics of his oath were broken by his own statements regarding this situation that he so proudly shared on video. Supporters of his actions would not be so quick to support his personal beliefs if they conflicted with their own. As Sheriff, his personal beliefs must be set aside in pursuit of rule of law. Put the shoe on the other foot and contemplate if someday his OPINION on a matter led him to arrest someone based on his OPINION rather than law. This would be fascist. Something we must guard against as a nation with rule of law.

Another in a long list of reasons to never shop at giant eagle. This evil bunch of fox chapel liberals will stop at nothing to quash competition and keep lining their back pockets. Isn't it funny how they opened Good Sense stores near Bottom Dollar stores and immediately closed them all when Bottom Dollar went out of business...? They made monopolized the Pgh grocery market by cutting Krogers, A&Ps and Foodlands throats with really low prices and now the that their competition is all gone, they've raised their prices to the roof! And you people who think that ge's fuel perks are a good deal need to buy some swampland in Fla. But, they are buddies with the the local and state leftist politicians, so their legally questionable business tactics will never be scrutinized... >>NEVER BUY AT GIANT TURD-BIRD STORES<<

1995 I hitched from San Francisco to Petersburg, AK. It was my great adventure, spent a year traveling the west coast met some amazing people AND learned to drive a fork lift on the docks unloading boats. To be young and fearless.
